channel.title: Making project insanity server from scratch
channel.description: [size=24pt][font=courier]Phat-pkz coming soon!!![/font][/size] Finally made a point system where you can gain points from doing skills. Adding a shop with cool rewards in it I might add the chaotics in the shop for 10-15k points each considering it is not that hard to earn Points in the first place. Replaced piety with custom turmoil, I am trying to add sigil on blessed spirit shield but I keep getting errors =/. I am trying to add the real effects for divine spirit shield at the moment :). I'm adding a helpdesk etc. And for the new home at the moment lumbridge is in the lead at 2 votes so get your votes in people :). Added working autocasting for ancient staff, :). Added 562 gameframe. Slayer is now 100% with no bugs or glitches, I also made the drop rates of whips pretty high considering you need 85 slayer to kill abyssal demons. Added pvp zones, adding ::brid for bridding gear, and ::switch which will auto switch the first 8 items in your inventory with the ones you have on. Adding ::funpk where you do not lose your items also adding a pvp gear shop where you can buy some nice pvp gear for a nice price. Also a problem I have ran into is that you can wear rune armor with 1 Defence, I will be trying to fix. Also I am going to make all of the items ingame have the exact bonuses that runescape has today, also I am now done adding dragon claw special (correct) also you hold dragon claws the correct way and they hit the correct way. Made training your combat easier to do. Made it to where you hold your godswords the correct way and they have the real runescape specials. Adding a banner soon and pictures to update you guys with ;). So yeah guys basically I have been working on a [pi] server from scratch and what it has so far: 3 chaotics which are the rapier, the longsword, and the maul. All of the spirit shields with real runescape bonuses.(effects coming later) Added a point system where by doing basic stuff you can earn points to get items ;). Made dragon claws special work just like real runescape with correct hits. 562 gameframe, lunar altar and lunar spells work, ancient altar and ancient spells work, I will let you guys decide the new home in a poll. Turmoil with real bonuses, lightning gfx, may change soon. adding godwars soon. Full Statius and Vesta's armours and weapon's with special attacks that really degrade. Adding donatorzone may let people vote on that too, adding a miniquest with reward. Adding artifacts that give cash as rewards, adding thieving stalls. Adding armadyl, bandos, and saradomin bosses, maybe zamorak in the future. Making godwars bosses hit correctly :). Adding tons of shops. Making working duel arena, a few bugs then duel arena will be added. Adding working auto-casting for ancient staff, adding a good starter with items that will not ruin the economy. Making new pvp zones, and I am trying to make magebank work correctly. Still not sure how to make the dragons look like from real runescape at the moment, they still look like the dragons from the old days. Godswords will be held correctly like real runescape, if someone can help me I will try to add torva and some other nice items. Chaotic rapier correct stance. Chaotic maul correct stance and attack like real runescape. Chaotic longsword correct stance and hits like real runescape. Adding corporeal beast soon, and maybe add some mini corporeal beasts ;). Adding some great donator benefits, including shops with items you can't get anywhere else. I will make donator shop items untradeable. So yeah guys wish me luck ;).

But the time I am spending is well worth it
I am trying to be original and add stuff into a server that has never been added before
Infact I just made the rocks by the water at the end of
The barbarian assault place take you to the other side of the river and then you open up the doors to the lighthouse and click on the trapdoor taking you to the daggs

item.title: Making project insanity server from scratch
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

[quote=“James-RevolutionX, post:38, topic:401191”]At least someone wants to learn, don’t go flaming him just because he wants to learn, I don’t see any of you guys starting from scratch.

And there isn’t a Java book on ‘creating Minigames’ you create that using Java.[/quote]

Rsps is hardly java, every dumb motherfucker that learns how to program something into an rsps and claims they know java is, well… a dumb motherfucker.

I wish you luck, but removing all the content seems stupid. You can just read through it repeatedly and learn it that way.

[quote=“austin cadle, post:40, topic:401191”]At the moment I am having a pretty hard time adding jad
I can’t seem to add him inside of the cave maybe if anybody could help me? :)[/quote]

Are you trying to use spawn-config? That won’t work, because fight caves uses a bunch of different height levels for different people.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“someone2, post:37, topic:401191”]But… If you’re using Project Insanity, and just removed some things…

It isn’t from scratch…?[/quote]James brings up an interesting point below you, you can base one minigame to create a new and improved one. You also learn about several items from doing this such as timers etc.

Read full topic
